fixes.name: DV01 T (USD, Actuals)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR endDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DV01 (In USD)],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = endDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DV01 (In USD)],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]). Preserved the nested IF logic and transformed all column references to the table-qualified format 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column]. Used VARs for the parameter values for clarity.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
